titleStmt.title: The agreemente of sondry places of scripture seeming in shew to iarre, seruing in stead of commentaryes, not onely for these, but others lyke, translated out of French, and nowe fyrst publyshed by Arthure Broke. Seene and allowed, accordyng to the ordre appoynted in the Queenes Maiestyes iniunctions.
titleStmt.author: Brooke, Arthur, d. 1563.

titleStmt.title: The agreemente of sondry places of scripture seeming in shew to iarre, seruing in stead of commentaryes, not onely for these, but others lyke, translated out of French, and nowe fyrst publyshed by Arthure Broke. Seene and allowed, accordyng to the ordre appoynted in the Queenes Maiestyes iniunctions.
titleStmt.author: Brooke, Arthur, d. 1563.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Paules Churchyard, at the signe of the Crane, by Lucas Harrison,
